title: Escaping Emacs...(And You Thought Vim Was Hard To Quit!)
description:
Since starting the "Configuring Emacs" series, I've been getting some questions from viewers that are configuring Emacs and are having weird situations where they find themselves in Emacs buffers that they cannot escape from using their standard "quit" keybindings.
